infos.value: This is where Lady Loreila died...
...I see. Without her to bridge the gap between our villages, we ended up in this state.
Loreila... We are about to enter Gouga.
I will destroy it... The village in which you were born and raised.
Destroy Gouga? You never cease to amuse me.
Us settling this over Loreila's grave...it's fitting somehow, don't you think?
I shall strike you down here...and Mariale and Zazan will be next!
Oh? Go ahead and give it your best shot.
